Question: Another Side of this person, recorded on a single June evening in 1964, had a lighter mood than its predecessor.
Hints: Asked if he played the cowboy, this person replied, "No, I play my mother.".
This person's 1990s began with Under the Red Sky (1990), an about-face from the serious Oh Mercy.
This person also toured with The Grateful Dead in 1987, resulting in a live album This person & The Dead.
